column5: what do you all prefer.  One or two blades,  How many hooks do you use a treble at the end
i like one blade and one small treble

I use 2 blades,if your using colorado style make sure the front blade is a size or 2 smaller then the rear blade. I use 2 hooks with rear hook being a treble. Spin n Glows also work instead of using blades
I prefer one blade and two single hooks. Here's a few I just finished tying up which I hope to try out this weekend.

One blade and 3 single hooks here as well, I go with very large blades since your fishing in an ocean basically and ned to call them in. But I have been skunked the last 2 times so you may not want to listen to what I use!!!!

When " Erie Dearies " were popular I hated the gold plated Aberdeen hook that came on them, used to set them up with a single and a treble trailer snelled on mono like a worm harness, worked well off riggers or a dipsy for Erie eyes, the weighted head was less prone to line twist than a standard worm harness.
